alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 27 at 5:36AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CHST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 730 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 535 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.6 and 1.2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.8 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
